title: The California Club
description: When Lara Richards jets off to glamorous California, the last thing she’s expecting is to find her old friend Helen transformed from a clipboard-clasping frump into a shimmering surf goddess. The secret of her blissful new life? The mysterious California Club. So the offer of guest membership -- one wish, guaranteed to come true by the end of their stay -- is one Lara and her friends can’t resist.
author: Belinda Jones
